snippet: If the bird flu virus is confirmed at all five farms, the number of sites where H5 has been found in Iowa during this outbreak would rise to 17.
abstract: H5 avian flu is detected in initial tests at five additional poultry farms in Iowa, including commercial egg operation that houses some 5.5 million birds; cases, if confirmed, would bring number to more than 20 million birds, and result in largest death toll in bird flu outbreak in United States history.
lead_paragraph: If the bird flu virus is confirmed at all five farms, the number of sites where H5 has been found in Iowa during this outbreak would rise to 17.

headline.main: Avian Flu Infections Are Found at Five More Iowa Poultry Farms
headline.print_headline: Avian Flu Infections Are Found at Five More Iowa Poultry Farms
